CustomProperties.Name: actionBeneath
CustomProperties.Tooltip: action buttons beneath or side by side

CustomProperties.Name: boxShadow
CustomProperties.Tooltip: If you want custom box shadow, insert it here in the format "box-shadow: 5px 5px 15px 5px #000000;"

CustomProperties.Name: timerStart
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Set to true when timer should start, set to false in onHide property
